abstract: Library of Congress exhibition opening March 21 will showcase political cartoons by Herbert L Block and other cartoonists.
lead_paragraph: The Library of Congress will showcase political cartoons in an exhibition opening March 21.

headline.main: Political Jabs in Ink at Library of Congress
headline.print_headline: Political Jabs in Ink at Library of Congress

snippet: The Library of Congress will showcase political cartoons in an exhibition opening March 21.
